title: Lunchbox
instructions:
You really like your lunchbox packed a certain way: sandwich on the left, drink in the middle, and snack on the right. However, sometimes you get a milkshake, which is too big to go in the lunchbox, so you carry it instead, and just put the sandwich and the snack in.

Write a function called `packALunch` that takes three inputs: `sandwich`, `drink`, and `snack` (all strings). It should return a list of the items packed into the lunchbox.

You must create only one list and use `push` to add items to it.
hints: Start by creating an empty list
Use push() to add items to your list one at a time
Check if the drink is "milkshake" before adding it
Remember: push() returns the new list, so reassign it
